channel.title: nuget on Thomas Levesque's .NET Blog
channel.description: Recent content in nuget on Thomas Levesque's .NET Blog

item.title: Publishing a package from AppVeyor to NuGet.org
item.description: In the last few months, I’ve been using AppVeyor CI on some of my open-source projects (along with Cake for the build scripts). I really like it, but one thing bothered me: I couldn’t find a way to manually publish packages to NuGet.org directly from AppVeyor. I had to download the package locally, then upload it manually from my machine (either with nuget push on the command line, or via the web form on NuGet.
